title: Gedolim Visit Geneva for Torah
body: Rabbi Gedolim of Eretz Yisroel traveled to Geneva for the Keren Olam HaTorah mission, a initiative to strengthen Torah learning and support kollelim and yeshivos in the Holy Land. The visit began in Zurich, where the delegation davened Shacharis before departing.

title: Rav Rafael Yehuda Berdugo Passes
body: Rav Rafael Yehuda Berdugo zt”l, a beloved marbitz Torah and rov, passed away. He served as spiritual guide in Migdal HaEmek and later resided in Yerushalayim's Bayit Vegan neighborhood.
